name: Jump and Hover
description:
Jump and Hover is a puzzle platformer where you can hover midair but only for a short time. Recharge your hover energy by landing on the ground or touching a battery.

Controls

Move: A/D or Left/Right Arrows

Jump/Hover: W/Up Arrow (hold in air to hover)

Reset: R

Back: Esc or B

Update 1

Adjusted levels 3, 5, 7.

Added space as alternate jump/hover key.
